body:
Hi Brajesh,

Usually a few months before the workshop there is a call for speakers and
the results of that will define the core content. In the past there has also
been a tutorial component to some of the workshops (last year there was an
all-day HDR imaging tutorial). I'd expect an update on cost and content
after the call for speakers goes out.

I am hoping to make it out there this year, and the new dates work for me,
so, yay.

- Rob

On 4/28/10 5:00 AM, "Brajesh Lal" <brajeshlal@yahoo.com> wrote:
subject: [Radiance-general] 2010 Workshop Dates
